info.name: Slickdeals - More Deals for New Design
info.description: I love me some Slickdeals, but their new design lacks the density of their old design. So, I compacted the new design, without stifling the new look.
info.additionalInfo: Send me an email chriscdg@gmail.com, if you want any updates. This was just for personal use, but I figured someone else might find this handy.
